channel.title: DC bug. patch 1.0.10
channel.description:
#### What happened? I dc'd and when I rc'd chat wouldn't work, I would type into chat and no one could see what I wrote
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? When I type into chat and hit enter other players can see my words #### Steps to reproduce: DC, RC and type into chat? #### Comments: Lost the game from this bug was mastermind with 3 unseen, 3 neutrals and 1 bd left couldn't type so I couldn't really play when it was an easy win. got executed because I couldn't respond

item.title: DC bug. patch 1.0.10
item.dc:creator: WyrmWyrd
item.description:
What happened?

I dc’d and when I rc’d chat wouldn’t work, I would type into chat and no one could see what I wrote

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

When I type into chat and hit enter other players can see my words

Steps to reproduce:

DC, RC and type into chat?

Comments: Lost the game from this bug was mastermind with 3 unseen, 3 neutrals and 1 bd left

couldn’t type so I couldn’t really play when it was an easy win. got executed because I couldn’t respond

Read full topic
